definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Pudong New District, subprovincial district of Shanghai

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Pu3 dong1 Fa1 zhan3 Yin2 hang2

sentences.english: We may ride the magnetic suspension train to go to the Pudong international airport.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以乘磁懸浮列車去浦東國際機場。

sentences.english: It goes from Shanghai Station to Pudong Airport in eight minutes.
sentences.chinese: 它從上海站到浦東機場只要八分鐘。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the study on the city historical transformation of modern Pudong district.
sentences.chinese: 本文以近代浦東城區歷史變遷爲研究對象。

sentences.english: You can take the maglev train at Pudong Airport.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從浦東國際機場乘坐磁懸浮列車。

sentences.english: No. 17 North Nanquan Rd. , Lujiazui, near Pudong Ave.
sentences.chinese: 南拳北麓17號，陸家嘴，近浦東大道。

sentences.english: The Pudong government pays Gao's tuition.
sentences.chinese: 浦東區政府支付了高的學費。

sentences.english: It located in Pudong Expo B east axis.
sentences.chinese: 它位於浦東B片區世博軸東側。

sentences.english: Wir lebten in der Pudong New Area.
To press upon, the Pudong International Airport, flights and order was gradually restored.
sentences.chinese: 到記者發稿時止，浦東國際機場航班秩序也逐漸恢復。

sentences.english: After visiting Chenghuangmiao, we went to Pudong District to visit Dongfang Pearl Towel.
sentences.chinese: 逛完城隍廟後，我們乘車去浦東參觀東方明珠。

sentences.english: Viewing skyscrapers in Pudong has become a tourist attraction for visitors in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 如今，浦東觀樓已成了上海的一大旅遊景觀。

sentences.english: On the way from the Pudong Airport to the hotel, Mr. Brown is talking with Ms. Lin
sentences.chinese: 從浦東機場去賓館的路上，布朗先生與林女士交談。

sentences.english: The Ramada Plaza Pudong-Shanghai is situated in the heart of Jinqiao Export Processing Zone.
sentences.chinese: 上海浦東華美達大酒店坐落於金橋出口加工區的中心。

sentences.english: The Eton Hotel Shanghai is strategically located in the heart of Lujiazui Finance and Trade Zone in Pudong.
sentences.chinese: 上海裕景飯店地處繁華的浦東陸家嘴金融貿易區中心。

sentences.english: The Expo Axis is the main axis in Pudong Expo Site.
sentences.chinese: 世博軸式浦東世博園區的主軸線。

definition: Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai
Wuxi prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Hongqiao, the name of numerous entities, notably a major airport in Shanghai, and a district in Tianjin
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Suzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Pudong New District, subprovincial district of Shanghai
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
